findings.description: Loading placeholder emoji lacks aria-hidden attribute
findings.remediation:
Add aria-hidden="true" to decorative emoji:
üîç
findings.impact: Screen readers will announce the magnifying glass emoji unnecessarily during load

findings.description: Loading text lacks proper semantic structure
findings.code_snippet: Loading Truth Hunters...
findings.remediation: Use role="status" and aria-live="polite" for loading message
findings.impact: Screen reader users may not be informed that content is loading

findings.description: Disabled buttons use opacity: 0.5 which may not meet 3:1 contrast ratio for UI components
findings.remediation: Ensure disabled state meets 3:1 contrast ratio. Consider using explicit colors instead of opacity: background: disabled ? 'var(--bg-elevated)' : variants[variant].background
findings.impact: Users with low vision may not be able to distinguish disabled buttons

findings.description: Header control buttons have minHeight: 36px, below WCAG 2.2 AA requirement of 44x44 CSS pixels
findings.remediation: Increase minHeight to at least 44px: minHeight: '44px'
findings.impact: Users with motor impairments and touch screen users will have difficulty activating these controls

findings.description: Team avatar selection buttons may not meet 44x44px minimum touch target size
findings.remediation: Ensure buttons are at least 44x44px. Add: minWidth: '44px', minHeight: '44px'
findings.impact: Users may have difficulty selecting avatars on touch devices

findings.description: Icon-only buttons for previous rounds and keyboard hints are too small
findings.remediation: Increase button size to meet 44x44px minimum: minWidth: '44px', minHeight: '44px'
findings.impact: Users may struggle to activate small icon buttons

findings.description: Team name input uses only a label above, no visible label association
findings.remediation: Add htmlFor/id association: <label htmlFor="team-name">TEAM NAME *</label><input id="team-name" />
findings.impact: Screen reader users may not have clear label association

findings.description: Player name inputs rely on aria-label but visual column headers are not programmatically associated
findings.remediation: Use proper table markup with <th> elements for column headers or add visible <label> elements
findings.impact: Visual layout suggests structure not available to AT users

findings.description: Result emoji (‚úì/‚úó) lacks aria-hidden attribute
findings.remediation: Add aria-hidden="true" since status is conveyed via text: <div aria-hidden="true">
findings.impact: Screen readers announce redundant emoji information

findings.description: Multiple decorative emojis in final score display lack aria-hidden
findings.code_snippet: Final score display uses emojis without aria-hidden
findings.remediation: Wrap all decorative emojis with aria-hidden="true"
findings.impact: Screen readers announce unnecessary decorative content

findings.description: How to Play steps use manual numbering instead of ordered list semantics
findings.remediation: Use <ol> instead of <ul> for numbered list: <ol style={{ listStyle: 'none' }}>
findings.impact: Screen reader users lose list navigation semantics

findings.description: Stats grid lacks semantic structure (could use dl/dt/dd)
findings.remediation: Consider using definition list for key-value pairs: <dl><dt>Accuracy</dt><dd>5/5</dd></dl>
findings.impact: AT users miss semantic relationship between labels and values

findings.description: text-secondary (#94a3b8) on bg-deep (#0a0e1a) has 8.7:1 ratio - PASSES but should verify in usage
findings.remediation: Continue monitoring usage. Current ratio of 8.7:1 exceeds AA (4.5:1) and AAA (7:1)
findings.impact: None - this color combination is compliant

findings.description: text-muted (#8b9cb8) on bg-deep (#0a0e1a) needs verification - appears borderline for small text
findings.remediation: Test actual contrast ratio. If below 4.5:1, lighten to at least #959fbd or use for large text only (18pt+)
findings.impact: Users with low vision may struggle to read muted text

findings.description: Presentation mode button text at fontSize: '0.6875rem' (11px) with light colors may not meet contrast
findings.remediation: Increase font size to at least 0.875rem (14px) or ensure 7:1 contrast for AAA compliance
findings.impact: Users with low vision cannot read small text

findings.description: Modal close button (‚úï) positioned absolutely may create unexpected focus order
findings.remediation: Ensure focus order is logical even with absolute positioning. Consider using focus trap or tabindex
findings.impact: Keyboard users may encounter confusing tab order

findings.description: Nested button inside radio button creates focus complexity
findings.remediation: Separate the help trigger from the radio button or use a non-button element with proper ARIA
findings.impact: Focus management may be confusing for keyboard users

findings.description: Smart quotes (') in text may cause issues with screen readers
findings.remediation: Use straight quotes for consistency with screen readers: you'll
findings.impact: Minor - some screen readers may mispronounce smart quotes

findings.description: Source badge emojis have aria-hidden but surrounding text may be unclear without emoji context
findings.remediation: Ensure the textual content fully conveys meaning: 'Student contribution by {name}'
findings.impact: Screen reader users may miss visual categorization cues

findings.description: Sound toggle switch has proper ARIA but visual indicator text (I/O) may be insufficient
findings.remediation: Add aria-label to inner span or use more descriptive text: 'ON' vs 'OFF'
findings.impact: Visual users may not understand I/O switch state

findings.description: Confidence preview uses visual formatting (|) for separation without semantic structure
findings.remediation: Use semantic elements: If right: +5 or separate divs
findings.impact: Screen reader users hear pipe character which may be confusing

findings.description: aria-describedby="confidence-preview" references element by ID but ID is not guaranteed unique across multiple instances
findings.remediation: Generate unique IDs using component instance ID or useId hook
findings.impact: Multiple voting sections on page would have duplicate IDs (invalid HTML)

findings.description: Timer countdown has aria-live='assertive' only when ‚â§10s, but should announce periodically
findings.remediation: Consider aria-live='polite' throughout, with assertive only at 10s for urgency
findings.impact: Screen reader users don't receive time updates during normal gameplay

findings.description: Streak fire emoji (üî•) lacks aria-hidden
findings.remediation: Add aria-hidden to emoji: üî• {currentStreak}
findings.impact: Screen readers announce 'fire' unnecessarily

findings.description: Keyboard shortcuts use uppercase (T/F/M) in help text but accept lowercase in handler
findings.code_snippet: T=True F=False M=Mixed but accepts t/f/m
findings.remediation: Clarify that both cases work: 'T/t=True' or update help text to match implementation
findings.impact: Users may be confused about whether case matters

findings.description: Citation links truncated with '...' may not provide sufficient context
findings.remediation: Add title attribute with full URL or use aria-label for context
findings.impact: Screen reader users may not understand link destination

findings.description: Print button uses only icon (üñ®Ô∏è) without accompanying text
findings.remediation: Text is present - this is compliant. Verify emoji is announced or add aria-label
findings.impact: None if emoji renders, but could fail if emoji not supported

findings.description: Toast notification icon has aria-hidden but is color-coded for meaning
findings.remediation: Ensure toast type is conveyed via text, not just icon color. Current implementation is compliant.
findings.impact: None - type is conveyed textually

findings.description: Toast has tabIndex={0} making it focusable, but clicking entire toast dismisses it which may be unexpected
findings.remediation: Consider making only the close button clickable, or add clear visual indication that entire toast is interactive
findings.impact: Users may accidentally dismiss toasts when trying to read them

findings.description: Confidence level uses only filled/empty circles (‚óè‚óã) for state, relying on visual pattern
findings.remediation: Add text label indicating level (Safe/Medium/Risky) is present. Ensure sufficient contrast between filled and empty.
findings.impact: Partially mitigated by text labels but ensure pattern is perceivable

findings.description: Modal uses ' HTML entity which should be avoided for readability
findings.remediation: Replace ' with straight apostrophe (') or use JSX {"'"} syntax
findings.impact: May cause issues with screen readers or text parsing

findings.description: Error messages could provide more specific recovery guidance based on error type
findings.remediation: Implement error type detection and provide specific guidance (e.g., 'Network error: check connection')
findings.impact: Users may not know how to recover from errors

findings.description: How to Play accordion button lacks explicit expanded/collapsed state
findings.remediation: Add aria-expanded attribute: aria-expanded={showHowToPlay}
findings.impact: Screen reader users don't know if section is expanded

findings.description: Achievements accordion button lacks aria-expanded
findings.remediation: Add aria-expanded={showAchievements}
findings.impact: Screen reader users cannot determine expansion state

findings.description: AI Error Patterns accordion button lacks aria-expanded
findings.remediation: Add aria-expanded={showPatterns}
findings.impact: Screen reader users cannot determine expansion state

findings.description: Reflection self-assessment buttons lack grouping or fieldset
findings.remediation: Wrap in fieldset with legend or add role='radiogroup' with aria-label
findings.impact: Relationship between buttons not clear to AT users

findings.description: Tab switch warning requires acknowledgment before continuing but timer keeps running
findings.code_snippet: Tab switch warning blocks interaction but no time extension
findings.remediation: Pause timer when warning is shown, or provide time extension option
findings.impact: Users may run out of time while reading the warning

findings.description: Tab switch penalty shown as both warning and automatic forfeit with inconsistent messaging
findings.code_snippet: Warning shows -10 penalty but system auto-forfeits
findings.remediation: Clarify that warning is informational about future behavior, or remove auto-forfeit if showing warning
findings.impact: Users may be confused about what happens when they switch tabs

findings.description: Speed bonus emojis (‚ö°) lack aria-hidden
findings.remediation: Add aria-hidden to icon or ensure it's in separate span: {icon}
findings.impact: Screen readers announce lightning bolt unnecessarily

findings.description: Footer uses paragraph for content that could be semantically richer
findings.remediation: Consider using address or div with appropriate semantic markup
findings.impact: Minor - current structure is acceptable but could be improved

findings.description: Verdict options use color coding (green/amber/red) but also include emoji and text
findings.remediation: Current implementation passes - emoji and text provide non-color indicators. Ensure colors are distinguishable for colorblind users.
findings.impact: None - sufficient non-color indicators present

findings.description: Arrow key navigation implemented but left/right may conflict with screen reader navigation
findings.remediation: Consider limiting to ArrowLeft/ArrowRight only to avoid conflicts with screen reader virtual cursor
findings.impact: May interfere with screen reader navigation modes

findings.description: Tutorial overlay emojis lack consistent aria-hidden treatment
findings.remediation: Wrap all decorative emojis in <span aria-hidden="true">
findings.impact: Screen readers announce decorative emojis

findings.description: Share button changes text based on action result but may be confusing
findings.remediation: Add aria-live region to announce state changes to screen readers
findings.impact: Screen reader users may not hear confirmation of share action

findings.description: Blockquote used for claim text but may not be a true quotation
findings.remediation:
If claims are not actual quotes, use

with visual styling instead of semantic
findings.impact: Screen readers announce as quotation which may be incorrect

findings.description: Research attribution text at 0.75rem may become unreadable if user increases text spacing
findings.remediation: Test with 1.5x line height, 2x paragraph spacing. Ensure container doesn't clip text.
findings.impact: Users who need increased text spacing may have issues

findings.description: Difficulty selection uses only visual grid layout without additional context
findings.remediation: Add aria-label to group or use fieldset/legend: <fieldset><legend>Difficulty</legend>
findings.impact: Screen reader users may not understand these are mutually exclusive options
